name: .RRI File Extension
summary: Learn about .RRI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Image format used by RealWorld Graphics products such as RealWorld Icon Editor and RealWorld Cursor Editor; saves a raster image that was edited in the software, but uses a proprietary format that can only be opened in RealWorld Graphics programs; used for making Windows icon and cursor graphics.

content: RRI images are less common than RealWorld Layered Images (.RLI), since the RRI format only supports a single editing layer while the RLI format supports multiple layers. Recent versions of Cursor Editor can open files in the RRI format, but it cannot save them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
